english.segment1: Just to rest in your arms. Close enough to hear your heart. Just to kneel at your feet. Where everything fades away and I sing
english.segment2: Jesus, Jesus, take me over now. I surrender. Everything I have, I lay it down. All of me
english.segment3: With just a glimpse of your face. All my fears melt away. Lost within your embrace. IÂ’m pouring out all my admiration
